greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 3a(n-1) - 3a(n-2) + 2a(n-3), a(0) = 3, a(1) = 2, a(2) = 0.
comment: Sequence is identical to its third differences. Binomial transform of 3, -1, -1, 3, -1, -1, 3, -1, -1, ... .
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3, -3, 2).
formula: a(n) = 2*A086953(n-1) for n>0. - _Rick L. Shepherd_, Aug 02 2017
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Sep 30 2007
